messages.subject: re: asthma
messages.msgSnippet: Melodie I don t have asthma (thankfully) but my husband and I both suffer from numerous allergies. I don t know what conditions would make asthma better or
messages.messageBody:
Melodie

I don't have asthma (thankfully) but my husband and I both suffer from
numerous allergies. I don't know what conditions would make asthma better or
worse except maybe air quality? Around the Puget Sound area there's quite a
variety of that. Good days and bad days...good areas and bad. Sometimes the
readings are off the scale in allergens like trees and grasses and mold. Do
any of those things make yours worse? We do have a lot of rain, of course. I
know quite a few people here with asthma and they seem to get by with
medication.

---Valerie
